text: Sharon Vandromme (born 2 October 1983) is a road cyclist from Belgium. She represented her nation at the 2004 Summer Olympics in the Women's road race. She also competed at the 2003, 2004 and 2006 UCI Road World Championships. ==References== ==External links== * profile at Procyclingstats.com Category:1983 births Category:Belgian female cyclists Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Olympic cyclists of Belgium Category:Cyclists at the 2004 Summer Olympics
title: Sharon Vandromme
